missing_merchant.title: The Missing Merchant
missing_merchant.hook: A trade merchant's wagon was found abandoned on the forest road. No bodies, no goods, just claw marks on the wood.
missing_merchant.details: Bertram the merchant was carrying a shipment of silver candlesticks for the temple. The wolf attacks might not be natural wolves at all. Elder Morris remembers similar disappearances 40 years ago.

cellar_noises.title: Things Below
cellar_noises.hook: Marta hears scratching from her tavern's cellar at night. Her cat won't go near the cellar door anymore.
cellar_noises.details: The tavern was built on older foundations. The scratching started after last month's heavy rains collapsed part of the cellar wall, revealing a passage. Marta hasn't told anyone - bad for business.

wolf_attacks.title: The Bold Hunt
wolf_attacks.hook: Wolves killed three sheep last night - inside a locked barn. Captain Aldric is organizing a hunt but needs capable volunteers.
wolf_attacks.details: These aren't normal wolf tactics. Tobias found a strange iron collar near the barn, too small for any dog. Someone or something may be controlling the pack.
